name: Neoneer
description:
You're playing as a small cube in a 2D neon themed world. Your goal - getting to the finish as soon as you can. Sounds easy right? Wrong!  Because there are invisible blocks and some fake ones. The levels are revealing themselves as you play more.  It's an easy to play game with as little as 4 controls.

Compete with your friends for the best time or who has the most points. Look at the level select and see what levels you have mastered and which of them could hide coin in them.

Choose from up to ten different skins with country flags. You can equip one of five trails that will shine wherever you go.

Controls:

W / arrow up / space  -> Jump 
S / arrow down / shift -> Dash down
A / arrow left -> Left
D / arrow right -> Right

R-> Quick restart
ESC -> Quit

Pro tip: Spikes can’t be floating. There is always something below / on top of them.

Don’t die.
